2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

- MFA Enabled: [Yes/No]
- AI Provider: [e.g. Claude, OpenAI, None]
- Email Notifications: [Enabled/Disabled]
